Sentencas: The structure, electrical conducting, thermal expansion and electrocatalytic properties of Ln(0.3)Sr(0.7)Fe(0.7)Cr(0.3)O(3-delta) (Ln = La, Pr, Nd, Sm) perovskites were investigated to evaluate their potential for cathodes of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: Reducing the size of the lanthanide cations enhanced the deformation of the perovskite structures and decreased the dimension of the primitive unit cells.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the oxygen nonstoichiometry (delta) values at elevated temperatures slightly increased.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity degraded with smaller lanthanide cation sizes, while the thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) tended to decrease.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: These property changes were diagnosed with respect to the corresponding structural evolutions.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: Sm0.3Sr0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-delta was identified to be the optimal composition after an overall property assessment.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: This composition exhibited an average TEC (similar to 14 x 10(-6)K(-1) between 40 and 1000 degrees C) compatible with IT-SOFC electrolytes, eligible electrical conductivity and good electrocatalytic activity.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect

Sentencas: The good overall properties of Sm0.3Sr0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-delta demonstrate that this composition is a promising cathode material for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Property optimization for strontium-rich lanthanum chromium ferrite cathodes: A demonstration of lanthanide replacement effect
